review: This device brings new life to a 2nd TV that is not internet ready. I have watched a few movies via Amazon using this over my home WiFi and the video quality was great on my 32" LCD 720P TV. I was especially impressed with the quality of an old B/W John Wayne movie that was adapted to HD format through Amazon's library. The instructions recommend leaving the device attached to the power adapter while its plugged into the TV's HDMI port - a good idea, since some TV's may not be able to supply enough current through the HDMI ports to fully power the device. The remote control, although of an odd size, worked very well.
